metadata.description: Overcoming time, a hot embracing love ...  Mizuo Yanase skipped Tea making class and snuck off to a temple, when he suddenly slipped through time from the present world the Sengoku era. There he meets Lord Takakage. "You came to this time to meet me…" Finally, a sengoku era romance!
metadata.name: LOVE BEYOND TIME (Yaoi Manga)
